title: Redmi Note 7 - The New Value King
description: With a 48MP camera, solid specs and a huge battery the Redmi Note 7 is seriously impressive. How Nintendo Invented the PlayStation:  Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
